title: Fashion!
author: JGray
text:
Well, Theresa putting on lip gloss didn't attract a lot of commenting. Mandrake looking cute in a new outfit didn't attract of commenting. If Theresa in a dress doesn't generate some comments? I'm gonna cry.

More seriously, Genn and I are paying a lot of attention to fashion this particular storyline. Everyone's in a new outfit and we're doing big reveals for each of them. Mandrake was first. Theresa is second. Wait till you see Chrys!

Hope you enjoy it!

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Never pictures Theresa outside her tanktop and fatigue shorts...interesting

replies.author: Hollis*Guest*
replies.text:
Figures... Theresa is all dolled up and gorgeous, and Chrys is late.


Not a date, my ass!

replies.author: rachel
replies.text: Definitely a date. Gorgeous, really. And I do like the attention to fashion! I guess I'll never escape that.

replies.author: Gillsing*Guest*
replies.text: If it's a date, why is Mandrake there? As a chaperon? Or as a "not a date" alibi? Or are they all just going to the same party?

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: I would not be surprised if Chrys is in a tux.

replies.author: haggis25*Guest*
replies.text:
I already love how this "Not-Date" is shaping up.

Her muscles seem more noticeable then normal, but that might just be the contrast between her muscles and the dress. Not a bad thing really, just a bit of curveball when you first see it.

replies.author: rss*Guest*
replies.text: I look for updates via rss feed. The rss feed was frozen at Awkward Silence I, about 2 months ago. It appears to be back.

replies.author: Doku*Guest*
replies.text: Theresa...in a dress. Well, that just about settles it. We're at the end times. Joking, joking, of course. Must admit, the look was different, but in a good way.
